triples.name: Autonomous underwater vehicle
triples.relevance: Core subject of the survey - submersible vehicles controlled by onboard computers used in multi-AUV formation systems.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: Theoretical foundation for formation control methods that govern multiple AUV behavior.

triples.name: Underwater acoustic communication
triples.relevance: Critical communication capability for coordinating multi-AUV formations and enabling underwater data transmission.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Conceptual framework for understanding cooperative control of multiple autonomous AUVs working together.

triples.name: Hydrographic survey
triples.relevance: Key application domain for multi-AUV formations to perform ocean mapping and underwater feature measurement.
